How do the fees of various Verus mining pools compare to each other?

The fees of various Verus mining pools vary, ranging from 0% (cloudiko.io) to 5% (Verus Pool). Here is a breakdown of the fees for each pool:

* Verus Pool: 5% (donated to Verus foundation)
* LuckPool: 1%
* ZergPool: 0.5%
* CiscoTech: 1%
* LePool: 1%
* Zhuaao: 1%
* AlphatechIT: 0.2%
* Wattpool: 0.5%
* 011Data: 0.5%
* vipor.net: 0.1%
* cloudiko.io: 0%
